saying: That's the way the energy bar crumbles.
description: Leonardo is a tiger villager from the Animal Crossing series. He debuted in the Japan exclusive title Doubutsu no Mori e+, and then after being absent from Animal Crossing: Wild World and Animal Crossing: City Folk, reappeared in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. His name is a reference to a leopard, which he resembles. Likewise, his Japanese name comes from hyou, meaning leopard. His Japanese initial phrase, ja ga, means "though" and is a pun on jagā, meaning "jaguar."
